item.title: 'Dancing With the Stars' finalists are...
item.description: "Dancing With the Stars" will soon crown a winner, but some hearts had to be broken along the way.
item.ExtractedText:
Facebook Twitter Instagram
'Dancing With the Stars' finalists are... Updated 1403 GMT (2203 HKT) May 17, 2016 14 photos: 'Dancing with the Stars' season 22 cast Nyle DiMarco, who is paired with pro dancer Peta Murgatroyd, stood out as the first deaf contestant on "America's Next Top Model" Then he won the reality model competition in 2015. He's now a fan favorite on "Dancing With the Stars." Click through to meet the rest of the dance pairs. Hide Caption 1 of 14 14 photos: 'Dancing with the Stars' season 22 cast Singer Wanya Morris, part of the hit R&B group Boyz II Men, is dancing up a storm on season 22 of "Dancing With the Stars." Paired with professional dancer Lindsay Arnold, Morris was eliminated in the semi-finals. Hide Caption 2 of 14 14 photos: 'Dancing with the Stars' season 22 cast UFC fighter Paige "12 Gauge" VanZant, who is paired with pro dancer Mark Ballas, is a top-ranked contender in the women's straw-weight division. She also has a not-so-secret weapon: Her parents owned a dance studio, and she grew up dancing there. Hide Caption 3 of 14 14 photos: 'Dancing with the Stars' season 22 cast Super Bowl 50 MVP Von Miller of the Denver Broncos, who is known for his dance moves in the end zone, is paired with professional dancer Witney Carson. The pair were eliminated in week 7. Hide Caption 4 of 14 14 photos: 'Dancing with the Stars' season 22 cast "The O.C." star Mischa Barton, who is paired with Artem Chigvintsev, has a strong background in New York theater. But she hasn't had many big hits since the 2003-07 television hit went off the air. They were eliminated in week 3. Hide Caption 5 of 14 14 photos: 'Dancing with the Stars' season 22 cast Pittsburgh Steelers wide receiver Antonio Brown, who is paired with pro dancer Sharna Burgess, will bring his quick feet to the dance floor as a celebrity contestant. They were eliminated in the semifinals. Hide Caption 6 of 14 14 photos: 'Dancing with the Stars' season 22 cast Actress Kim Fields, who is paired with pro dancer Sasha Farber, starred in "Facts of Life" as a child and "Living Single" as a young adult and currently stars on "The Real Housewives of Atlanta." They were eliminated in week 7. Hide Caption 7 of 14 14 photos: 'Dancing with the Stars' season 22 cast Heisman Trophy winner Doug Flutie, who is paired with Karina Smirnoff, played football professionally in the USFL, the National Football League and the Canadian Football League. He's now an analyst for the NBC Sports Group. The pair were eliminated in week 6. Hide Caption 8 of 14 14 photos: 'Dancing with the Stars' season 22 cast Marla Maples, an ex-wife of Republican presidential hopeful Donald Trump's, is paired with pro dancer Tony Dovolani. Maples married Trump in 1993 and divorced him in 1999. They have one daughter, Tiffany. Maples and Dovolani were eliminated in week 4. Hide Caption 9 of 14 14 photos: 'Dancing with the Stars' season 22 cast Actress Jodie Sweetin, a veteran of "Full House" and co-star of "Fuller House," was the first celebrity competitor announced for the current season. She's paired with pro dancer Keo Motsepe. They were eliminated in week 8. Hide Caption 10 of 14 14 photos: 'Dancing with the Stars' season 22 cast ABC News chief meteorologist Ginger Zee, who is paired with pro dancer Valentin Chmerkovskiy, got a serious workout. Chmerkovskiy won season 20 with Rumer Willis. Hide Caption 11 of 14 14 photos: 'Dancing with the Stars' season 22 cast Fox News senior correspondent Geraldo Rivera, who was paired with pro dancer Edyta Sliwinska, was the first competitor eliminated this season. Though Rivera has worked for "20/20" and other mainstream media, he's best known for his controversial talk show, "Geraldo," where arguments about controversial topics sometimes turned physical. The couple were the first to be eliminated on the show. Hide Caption 12 of 14 14 photos: 'Dancing with the Stars' season 22 cast Sharp-tongued judge Len Goodman, center, who took season 21 off, is back, joined by returning judges Carrie Ann Inaba and Bruno Tonioli. Hide Caption 14 photos: 'Dancing with the Stars' season 22 cast The reality dance show is hosted by Tom Bergeron and Erin Andrews. Hide Caption
